argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplasclf.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplasclf.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | mplasclf.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mplasclf.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 5 |  | mplasclf.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 6 |  | mplasclf.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` P ) = ( Scalar ` P ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_mplring | |- ( ( I e. W /\ R e. Ring ) -> P e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_mpllmod | |- ( ( I e. W /\ R e. Ring ) -> P e. LMod ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 7, 8, 9, 10, 2 | #P_asclf | |- ( ( I e. W /\ R e. Ring ) -> A : ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) --> B ) |
| 12 | 5, 6, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> A : ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) --> B ) |
| 13 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_mplsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` P ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) ) |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> K = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_feq2d | |- ( ph -> ( A : K --> B <-> A : ( Base ` ( Scalar ` P ) ) --> B ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> A : K --> B ) |
